Joins this composite with another NodeCollection. The resulting NodeCollection is sorted and merged, and converted to a primitive if possible.

memberdef.name: slice

detaileddescription.para: Slices the NodeCollection to the boundaries, with an optional step parameter. Note that the boundaries being specified are inclusive.

parameterdescription.para: Index of the NodeCollection to start at
One past the index of the NodeCollection to stop at
Number of places between node IDs to skip. Defaults to 1

simplesect.para: a NodeCollection pointer to the new, sliced NodeCollection.

detaileddescription.para: Sets the metadata of the NodeCollection.
Gets the metadata of the NodeCollection.
Checks if the NodeCollection has no elements.

simplesect.para: true if the NodeCollection is empty, false otherwise

detaileddescription.para: Returns index of node with given node ID in NodeCollection.

detaileddescription.para: Returns whether the NodeCollection contains any nodes with proxies or not.

simplesect.para: true if any nodes in the NodeCollection has proxies, false otherwise.

detaileddescription.para: Subclass for the composite NodeCollection type.

The composite type contains a collection of primitives which are not contiguous and homogeneous with each other. If the composite is sliced, it also holds information about what index to start at, one past the index to end at, and the step. The endpoint is one past the last valid node.
